document_data.name: Heart of Wine
document_data.mainbody: '''Heart of Wine''' was a special alcoholic beverage found in [[Zakhara]]. It was made by aging [[wine]] in the desert heat or mountain snows until all of the water evaporated or froze, leaving behind a potent substance. As with all alcoholic drinks, Heart of Wine was forbidden in any area controlled by [[moralist]]s.{{cite book/Arabian Adventures|93}}
document_data.Prices: A {{SIAdj|0.5|gal|l}} pitcher sold for 2 [[gp]].{{cite book/Arabian Adventures|86}}
